task.title: Escape classification data
task.shortdesc: Steps that describe how to escape classification data in the classification file.

step.cmd: Ensure that the classification file format is v2.1.

info.p: If v2.1 is enabled, you will see a line similar to :

p.codeblock: ## SC SiteCatalyst SAINT Import File v:2.1
p.note: To specify a format of v2.1, enable Quoted Output when exporting the file on the Classification Importer page (Browser Export or FTP Export).
